downloadTitle: Archive Viewer Quick Card for Workers Role
downloadDescription: This document describes how end users can perform daily tasks in the Archive Viewer.

downloadFile.name: Archive Viewer Quick Card for Workers 8.2.doc

detailsSection:
The Microsoft® Exchange Hosted Services archive can be accessed through the Archive Viewer—a Web-based console that enables end users to perform daily tasks, such as searching for and viewing messages. This document covers the following tasks:
• Sign in to the Archive Viewer
• View messages
• Search for messages
• Send or reply to e-mail
• Restore messages
• Export messages
• Manage folders
detailsSection_file_name: Archive Viewer Quick Card for Workers 8.2.doc
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
